snippet.title: Wall Town Wonders | Announce Trailer | Meta Quest Platform
snippet.description:
Wall Town Wonders - A mixed reality game that turns your living room into a lively miniature town available now for pre order on Meta Quest Store!

Pre order now at: https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/6103056399797843/ 

In Wall Town Wonders, your living room becomes the foundation for a vibrant, miniature town populated by colorful, lively characters. Step into a magical world where you'll help these tiny residents rebuild their town, unlocking a treasure trove of unique buildings, characters, and customization options along the way.

With hand-tracking technology, players can interact with the town's people using only their hands, creating an unparalleled sense of realism and immersion. The gameplay is gentle and relaxing, designed to allow players to explore and nurture their town at their own pace in a soothing environment.  Customization is at the heart of Wall Town Wonders. With over 40 different characters to meet, close to 100 buildings to unlock, and countless skins and customization options, no two towns will ever look the same. As you explore and help your town grow, you'll discover new looks and features that keep the experience fresh and uniquely tailored to your preferences.
